card_text: During this turn, each time a card(s) is banished from your hand, field, and/or GY by your opponent's activated monster effect, apply the following effects, based on where the cards were banished from.$N●Hand: Banish up to 2 random cards from your opponent's hand.$N●Field: Banish up to 2 cards your opponent controls.$N●GY: Banish up to 2 cards from your opponent's GY.
